channel.title: ssh on HotspotCepeda, La red comunitaria.
channel.description: Recent content in ssh on HotspotCepeda, La red comunitaria.

item.title: Ejecutar aplicación por ssh
item.author: hotspotcepeda@gmail.com (HotspotCepeda)
item.description: SERVIDOR Agregar en # nano /etc/ssh/sshd_config X11Forwarding yes # service ssh restart CLIENTE $ ssh -X -Y user@maquina -p puerto aplicación
item.dc:creator: HotspotCepeda

item.title: Banner ssh
item.author: hotspotcepeda@gmail.com (HotspotCepeda)
item.description: Este banner bash requiere de: # apt-get install uprecords hddtemp lm-sensors #!/bin/bash $>> _ txtblk='\e[0;30m' # Black - Regular txtred='\e[0;31m' # Red txtgrn='\e[0;32m' # Green txtylw='\e[0;33m' # Yellow txtblu='\e[0;34m' # Blue txtpur='\e[0;35m' # Purple txtcyn='\e[0;36m' # Cyan txtwht='\e[0;37m' # White bldblk='\e[1;30m' # Black - Bold bldred='\e[1;31m' # Red bldgrn='\e[1;32m' # Green bldylw='\e[1;33m' # Yellow bldblu='\e[1;34m' # Blue bldpur='\e[1;35m' # Purple bldcyn='\e[1;36m' # Cyan bldwht='\e[1;37m' # White unkblk='\e[4;30m' # Black - Underline undred='\e[4;31m' # Red undgrn='\e[4;32m' # Green undylw='\e[4;33m' # Yellow undblu='\e[4;34m' # Blue undpur='\e[4;35m' # Purple undcyn='\e[4;36m' # Cyan undwht='\e[4;37m' # White bakblk='\e[40m' # Black - Background bakred='\e[41m' # Red bakgrn='\e[42m' # Green bakylw='\e[43m' # Yellow bakblu='\e[44m' # Blue bakpur='\e[45m' # Purple bakcyn='\e[46m' # Cyan bakwht='\e[47m' # White txtrst='\e[0m' # Text Reset clear echo "" echo -e "\033[44m Welcome server Ayto Cepeda guifi.
item.dc:creator: HotspotCepeda
